ReportText: EXAM: CHEST RADIOGRAPHY EXAM DATE: 07/23/2021 01:50 PM. CLINICAL HISTORY: Shortness of breath. COMPARISON: XR CHEST 1 VIEW AP/PA 07/19/2021 2:23 PM. TECHNIQUE: 1 view. FINDINGS: Lungs/Pleura: There is mild patchy opacity at the right lung base. Left lung is clear. No pleural effusion. No pneumothorax. Mediastinum: Within exam limitations, the cardiomediastinal contour is normal. Other: No acute osseous abnormality. IMPRESSION: Mild patchy opacity at the right lung base may be due to pneumonia.
